# The `AAKernelInfoFunction` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The function kernel info abstract attribute, basically, what can we say about a function with regards to the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-openmpopt-cpp-/kernelinfostate">KernelInfoState</a>. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The function kernel info abstract attribute, basically, what can we say about a function with regards to the <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-openmpopt-cpp-/kernelinfostate">KernelInfoState</a>.

Fixpoint iteration update function.

Will be called every time a dependence changed its state (and in the beginning).
